content.html: A lot of people are criticising Sony for raising the price of the PS5, but this is actually a good move and they're saving you money For example, I was originally going to buy a PS5 for 499 euro but now i'm not buying a PS5 at all
content.value:
A lot of people are criticising Sony for raising the price of the PS5, but this is actually a good move and they're saving you money

For example, I was originally going to buy a PS5 for 499 euro but now i'm not buying a PS5 at all
